verses.verse: If <S%G1437><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> with the languages <S%G1100><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of angels, <S%G32><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> I have become <S%G1096><s%> sounding <S%G2278><s%> brass, <S%G5475><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> a clanging <S%G214><s%> cymbal. <S%G2950><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> the gift of prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> mysteries <S%G3466><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> so as <S%G5620><s%> to remove <S%G3179><s%> mountains, <S%G3735><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> I dole <S%G5595><s%> out all <S%G3956><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> goods <S%G5224><s%> to feed <S%G5595><s%> the poor, <S%G2532><s%> and if <S%G1437><s%> I give <S%G3860><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> be burned, <S%G2545><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> it profits <S%G5623><s%> me nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> is patient <S%G3114><s%> and is kind; <S%G5541><s%> love <S%G26><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> envy. <S%G2206><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> brag, <S%G4068><s%> <S%G4068><s%> is <S%G5448><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> proud, <S%G5448><s%>

doesn't <S%G3756><s%> behave itself <S%G807><s%> inappropriately, <S%G807><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> its own <S%G1438><s%> way, <S%G3947><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> provoked, <S%G3947><s%> takes no <S%G3756><s%> account <S%G3049><s%> of evil; <S%G2556><s%>
doesn't <S%G1909><s%> rejoice in unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> rejoices <S%G4796><s%> with the truth; <S%G225><s%>
bears <S%G4722><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> believes <S%G4100><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> hopes <S%G1679><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> endures <S%G5278><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> fails. <S%G1601><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> where <S%G1535><s%> there are prophecies, <S%G4394><s%> they will be done away <S%G2673><s%> with. <S%G1535><s%> Where there are various languages, <S%G1100><s%> they will cease. <S%G3973><s%> Where <S%G1535><s%> there is knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> it will be done away with. <S%G2673><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> we know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> we prophesy <S%G4395><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part; <S%G3313><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> complete <S%G5046><s%> has come, <S%G2064><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> that which is <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1537><s%> partial <S%G3313><s%> will be done away with. <S%G2673><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> I was <S%G2252><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I spoke <S%G2980><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I felt <S%G5426><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child, <S%G3516><s%> I thought <S%G3049><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a child. <S%G3516><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> that <S%G3753><s%> I have become <S%G1096><s%> a man, <S%G435><s%> I have put away <S%G2673><s%> childish <S%G3516><s%> things. <S%G3588><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G737><s%> we see <S%G991><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> a mirror, <S%G1722><s%> dimly, <S%G135><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face. <S%G4383><s%> Now <S%G737><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> in <S%G1537><s%> part, <S%G3313><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> I will know <S%G1921><s%> fully, <S%G2531><s%> even as I was also <S%G2532><s%> fully known. <S%G1921><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> hope, <S%G1680><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> love <S%G26><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> â€” these <S%G5023><s%> three. <S%G5140><s%> <S%G1161><s%> The greatest <S%G3187><s%> of these <S%G5023><s%> is love. <S%G26><s%>
